parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not definitive proof that the post is not electoral propaganda, it is a factor to consider.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Dorin Curtean" and encourages voters to vote for him, specifying his position on the ballot ("poziția 40"). This directly refers to a candidate participating in the parliamentary elections.  This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The targeting data shows a significant reach across various age and gender demographics in Bihor County. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters to choose Dorin Curtean in the parliamentary elections. The call to action ("Votați Dorin Curtean") leaves no doubt about its intention to influence the electoral outcome. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It does not present news, analysis, or opinions; instead, it directly promotes a specific candidate. It does not adhere to journalistic standards of objectivity and impartiality.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct appeal for votes, exceeding the boundaries of personal expression.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2633125790192123</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes Dorin Curtean, a candidate in the parliamentary elections, urging voters to select him.  The post's paid nature, targeted reach, and explicit call to action ("Votați Dorin Curtean") strongly suggest it's electoral propaganda. The post's content and objective directly aim to influence the election results.  While lacking a CMF number, the other elements overwhelmingly point towards a violation.  The timing of the post (assuming it's after the official campaign period) further strengthens this conclusion.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Dorin Curtean</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
International Studio, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul independent Dorin Curtean, îndemnând alegătorii să voteze pentru acesta și specificând poziția sa pe buletinul de vot ("poziția 40"), având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea acestuia, fapt ce constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea campaniei electorale.  Reclama, cu ID-ul 2633125790192123,  se adresează publicului larg prin intermediul unei platforme publice, Facebook, și are ca obiectiv clar influențarea votului în favoarea lui Dorin Curtean, încălcând astfel prevederile legale.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
